actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration (without written report).

official_title: A resolution to authorize payment of back pay and retirement contributions from the contingent funds for former employee Candace M. Hanson.

summary.text: Authorizes the Senate Committee on Rules and Administration to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full settlement of a claim against the Senate Sergeant at Arms.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize payment of back pay and retirement contributions from the contingent funds for former employee Candace M. Hanson.
